9.3. Multivariate LSTM Models 137
not have values in the input time series at prior time steps. In turn, the choice of the size of
the number of input time steps will have an important eﬀect on how much of the training data
is used. We can deﬁne a function named split sequences() that will take a dataset as we
have deﬁned it with rows for time steps and columns for parallel series and return input/output
samples.
# split a multivariate sequence into samples
